title: André-Pierre Gignac
summary: André-Pierre Christian Gignac (born 5 December 1985) is a French professional footballer who plays as a striker for Liga MX club Tigres UANL. Gignac is described as a "powerful and dangerous" striker who is known for his "aerial presence".[4][5] He is known personally by teammates and friends as simply "Dédé".[6][7]
